title: BUG FOUND ----- Dragon appearing on map when already taken (OCE)
body:
I have a link here to my image I have uploaded from a screenshot of the game I was just playing.

I have found a bug for you.
The dragon icon was on my map in the bottom right of my screen. I placed a ward in Dragon spawn and the icon did not go away. 
I took this screenshot about 40sec after I placed the ward. Could you fix this issue please

Thanks
AndyTheEskimo

replies.body: Dragon could have been pulled out so steal potential is lower.

My ward was placed so you would see that. You would see attacks or something. It was a bug as I was certain they took drag only 1min or so ago. And I cant leave this on the NA website as the bug is not on NA duh

Theoretically that link is for anyone, just mention you're seeing it on OCE. And...the game files are the same on all servers, it's only language files that are different unless there is a special server specific event going on. Something like this, if you're seeing it on OCE, it's on NA too, and LAS, and EUNE etc etc....

Assuming it wasn't dragged out, best to post this here: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

They made a whole section for bug reports, someone who can fix it/pass it on to the right people is far more likely to see it there.
Dragon potentially could of been dragged out of the dragon pit?
